p.s: The given text is an excerpt from Barack Obama's speech On the American Dream during his first election campaincampaign which was hold on the 7th of November in 2007 in Bettendorf, Iowa.
It is about the American Dream and why Barack Obama fights for it.
In his speech Obama tells about the new experience he gets while he has traveledtravelled around the country.
He mentions he fights for the American Dream because it is a hope for every American.
That the dream helps people to raise up and does connect everyone in America.
But the American Dream dies more and more because the differences between the folks come slowly back again.
Obama says the folks need help and dreams would be worth fighting for.
